title: Chicken courgetti pho
ingredients: ['2.4L vegetable stock', '340g boneless chicken breasts', '170g sliced onion, separated into rings', '2 tablespoons oyster sauce', '1 1/2 teaspoons coconut sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 whole cloves', '1/2 teaspoon minced ginger', '2 whole star anise pods', '600g bean sprouts', '425g coarsely chopped bok choy cabbage', '4 courgettes']
